Articles.Content:
Hello!

Well, now I've gone and done it. After several months of owning KSP and lurking the forums as a guest (enough time to download an absurd number of mods and watch tons of people vastly out-perform me in every area), I've gone and made myself an account.

From what I've seen, this is one of the better online communities out there, and I hope to learn loads from you guys! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Welcome (again?) to the forums! Hope you have fun. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Welcome to forum! Yeah, it's a good community here as compared to other forums...
True, this is a great community. Hope to see you around!

Welcome in from the cold, lurker. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

An enormous amount of both fun and learning occur here.

Happy landings!
You can check out any time you like, but you can never leave Welcome!
